title: Ticket #3600: condor_userprio -grouprollup doesn't work with older negotiators
description:
late in the 7.9 series it was discovered that a missed merge conflict had resulted in the DRAIN_JOBS and GET_PRIORITY_ROLLUP commands having the same ID.

The command id for GET_PRIORITY_ROLLUP was changed to avoid this conflict, which results in the situation were a 7.9.6 and later condor_userprio when passed the -grouprollup option will fail to get user priorites when talking to a 7.9.5 and earler negotiator.

7.9.6 and later negotiators will respond to either the new command id for GET_PRIORITY_ROLLUP, or the old one that conflicted with DRAIN_JOBS.

Because of this we do not believe that this bug is going to have any impact on users.
check_ins: 2013-Apr-29 14:37   Check-in [35572]: reword version history item for this #3600 known bug (By Karen Miller )
creator: johnkn
